scripts.release: npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && gh release create v$(node -e "import { readFileSync } from 'fs'; import { join } from 'path'; console.log(JSON.parse(readFileSync(join(process.cwd(), 'package.json'), 'utf-8')).version);") dist/* --title "Release v$(node -e "import { readFileSync } from 'fs'; import { join } from 'path'; console.log(JSON.parse(readFileSync(join(process.cwd(), 'package.json'), 'utf-8')).version);")" --notes "Automated release"
